title: Lupo Grigio — Limited Edition Leather Goods
description: Deluxe, limited edition leather goods crafted for the discerning. Lupo Grigio wallets and accessories in small, numbered runs.
heroSubtitle: Small, numbered runs of premium leather goods. Designed in Italy, made to endure.
storyText: We release only a handful of pieces each season. Each item is individually numbered and crafted from full‑grain leather, developing a rich patina unique to you.
